page.title: 19A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content:
In the morning I got up out of bed and went downstairs and had my breakfast.I had Weetabix. I made my sandwiches and got changed and at 8 o'clock I went to school.
The school I go to is called Rushbury. When all the children are here and it is 9 o'clock we go for Assembly.
After Assembly today we wrote some stories then our teacher took us out to look at the countryside with a map. Then the first and second years went to watch the Domesday programme on television.
Then we had our dinner and played and at 1 o'clock we came in and painted a picture and had a story and went home.
